title: How metabolites target brain-homing immune cells to treat multiple sclerosis

title_detail.value: How metabolites target brain-homing immune cells to treat multiple sclerosis

summary: A new study details how metabolites can be used to inhibit epigenetic mechanisms and effectively treat multiple sclerosis and a range of other diseases.

summary_detail.value: A new study details how metabolites can be used to inhibit epigenetic mechanisms and effectively treat multiple sclerosis and a range of other diseases.
